snippet: Elana Meyers Taylor, the two-time Olympic women’s bobsled medalist, drove to a third-place finish in the United States four-man national team selection race at Park City, Utah, finishing behind Nick Cunningham and Steven Holcomb.
lead_paragraph: Elana Meyers Taylor, the two-time Olympic women’s bobsled medalist, drove to a third-place finish in the United States four-man national team selection race at Park City, Utah, finishing behind Nick Cunningham and Steven Holcomb.

headline.main: Female Bobsledder Could Race on Men’s Circuit
headline.print_headline: Female Sledder Could Race on Men’s Circuit
